ResourceHeader.ResourceName: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna (Raw Ne)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP4 raw electron density from the ESR (32 m) Steerable Antenna.

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP4 ESR Steerable Antenna Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3
